text: Daniel Higgins (born 8 April 1998) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Cove Rangers. Higgins has previously played for Dundee, Kilmarnock, Airdrieonians and Stranraer. ==Playing career== Higgins made his professional debut for Dundee on 8 April 2017, in a 1–0 defeat away to Heart of Midlothian Higgins signed for Kilmarnock on 23 June 2017. He was loaned to League One club Airdrieonians on 31 January 2018. In September 2018, he joined Stranraer on loan.
